node.excerpt: Phil and Jan's relationship started with a bang. Phil, having no car, borrowed Steven's mom's station wagon for their first date. Mrs. Bowman said if he cleaned it before giving it back he could use it for the night. He and Jan sat chatting in the…

frontmatter.title: No Drunk Elephants Allowed On Main Street
